content.webTitle: Recommended CD-roms:  Essential French and English Poetry Plus

fields.headline: Recommended CD-roms
fields.bodyText: Essential French Vector Ltd, £19.00 + VAT, 0161 8283000 Age 5-11 yrs Designed to provide the knowledge needed to introduce French at key stages 1 or 2, using audio and visual computer-based resources. Children manage their own progress and test themselves. Units cover pronunciation of letters and numbers; telling the time; money, days, dates, weather and basic phrases. It is a very simple piece of software - children can use it with the minimum of help. Essentials provides a practical way of introducing young children to French. Although it lacks work-sheets and a record-keeping facility, it is easy to use and motivating.  Read a full evaluation of this program at www.teem.org.uk English Poetry Plus (Chadwyck Healey, £265, 01223 271253) Age 14-16yrs Aimed at KS4 students who require detailed analysis of a range of poems. 5,000 poems from 300 English-speaking writers are included; a particular strength is the comparative study of major poets pre-1914. Different media are complementary and of excellent quality. The search facility helps pupils not only to compare but also, through the note-making facility, to synthesise information, so they are encouraged to think through their own ideas. This is an appropriate and convenient study aid, highly recommended. A copy held in the library would be of benefit to groups of up to three students studying at their own pace.  Read full evaluations of these programs at www.teem.org.uk
